fields.name: NotesToCandidates
fields.fieldText:
Notes to Candidates:

Theory exams answers will be saved at the end of each section. If you quit the exam without completing the section your answers will not be saved


GS&P Exams - All answers are saved at the end of the exam


On completion of the exam - your score will be emailed to you immediately.

fields.name: examCompletedMessage
fields.fieldText:
The exam you selected has already been completed.


Please go back and select another exam!
